"...Hm!":
"...I am sorry, Tsukuriyo. Because of my inexperience, you have been reduced to
this state."
"But we have come this far together. I would fight alongside you until I too am broken."
"Let this battle serve to guide the ARKS toward their future. This life was already forfeit 40 years ago. I would gladly give it to serve such a noble cause."
